title: Pro retina no video
message:
I try to repair this motherboard. It power but no video at screen. I have 38V at pin backlight. I tested another lcd and lcd cable that I took from working macbook retina 2013 and the same. What circuit I should check? I also have 5V at lvds.

Board is 820-3476

title: Pro retina no video
message: diode mode on all pins from eDP connector

title: Pro retina no video
message: 38V is way to high. I bet the connector is damaged on pin 1 and the LCD cable is usually damaged too then.
